title: Enhancing Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Mobile-Based Blended Training Program for Elementary Mathematics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematics curriculum and possession of basic teaching competencies
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Participants can master at least 80% of the latest teaching methodologies for elementary mathematics curricula via a mobile learning platform
Participants can evaluate their competency in designing mathematical problem-solving activities in blended learning environments
Participants can analyze digital tool-based mathematics lesson cases and develop three or more innovative instructional strategies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
